title: Plz add an ap guardian angel
body: Like,it's such a useful item, in fact, when i play {{champion:131}} if i see the game is at risk of throwing of being lost, i always build it and it usually save me the game. But plz riot, you made it so it only got ratio for ad champs its not fair, resureccting is pretty cool

Please Mr Silver 5 tell me how the game works, because I have no idea. First you are just wrong plenty of AD champs rely on their kits especially AD assassins. Wukong, Zed, Talon just for example heavily rely on their kits just as much as AP champs so we will consider them AD casters.  Second there are different types of AP user not just mages like you seem to assume. They want an AP fighter (Diana) but the only kind of AP fighter Item the have is ROA and maybe Rylais which fine whatever but they need an AP % shred like Black Cleaver. AP assassins are sharing the same items as Mages which is dumb because you don't have AD casters/fighters and Markman (usually excluding MF and Lucian building Black cleaver) building the same thing. They need different Items they need different passives. There are so many different types of AP users yet they are all stuck with the shitty AP items that are basically just stat boosts BIG EXAMPLE Rabadons which I would take an item that has a better passive like the Black Cleaver passive, but for an AP user.

I used black cleaver as a example to why  you can't have items like that for ap. Your also missing the point markman are auto based so why can't use the same items on them then you go to ap there all ability damage every fucking ap champion is based off that. You said that there are different types of ap champions but you did not say how like yeah there all different types of ap but that only means how the champion is played a ap assasin will most likely have the sames needs as a burst mage. But I will say ap items are really boring compared to ad and you are right they are just stat boost we can agree on that and I think that riot should of address this problem a long time ago.

Black Cleaver shreds based on AD damage including AD skills Like wukong ultimate so please tell me why there cannot be a version of Black Cleaver for AP that makes no sense what so ever. I am literally sick of people buying a spirit visage and then I do no damage unless I get a voidstaff which doesnt work for AP fighters and Assassins till last item. I am glad we can agree on AP items being boring stat sticks though a lot of people think AP items are overpowered but they are just boring.
